Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Ngifunga ngosuku lokuvuka kwabafileyo
Futhi ngifunga ngomphefumulo ozisolayo (ozithibayo)
Ngakube umuntu uyacabanga ukuthi angeke siwahlanganise amathambo akhe
Yebo siyakwazi ukuhlanganisa izihloko zeminwe yakho ngendlela enhle
Kepha umuntu uthanda ukuthi aqhubeke nokona (enze izono)
Uyabuza ukuthi luyofika nini usuku lokuvuka kwabafileyo
Ngenkathi kuxhopheka ukubona
Futhi inyanga iyonyamalala (iyofiphala)
Futhi kuyohlanganiswa ilanga nenyanga
Ngalolosuku umuntu uyothi, “ikuphi (indawo) yokubalekela?”
Lutho! Asikho isiphephelo
YiseNkosini yakho ngalolosuku lapho kuyoba yindawo yokuhlala (yokuphumula)
Uyotshenwa umuntu ngalolosuku ngalokho akuthumela ngaphambili nakushiya ngaphambili
Kepha umuntu uyoba ufakazi obhekene naye
Ngisho noma ngabe ebeka izizathu zakhe
Ungalunyakazisi ngalo (iQuran) ulimi lwakho ukuze usheshise ngayo
Ngempela (umthwalo) ophezulu kwethu ukuyihlanganisa kanye nokufundwa kwayo
Ngakho-ke ngenkathi siyifunda manjalo landela ukufundwa kwayo
Bese ngempela (umthwalo) ophezulu kwethu ukuchazwa kwayo
Lutho! Kepha nithanda impilo esheshayo
Futhi niyeka impilo ezayo
Ubuso ngalolosuku buyokhazimula
Bebheke eNkosini yabo
Futhi obunye ubuso ngalolosuku buyohwaqabala
Becabanga ukuthi bangase behlelwe yisehlo
Lutho! Ngenkathi kufinyelela engqwababeni
Futhi kuyothiwa, “ubani ozosindisa
Futhi uyocabanga ukuthi ukwehlikana
Futhi umlenze uyohlangana nomunye umlenze
Ngalolosuku kuseNkosini ukuqhutshwa
Akazange akholwe futhi akazange athandaze
Kepha waphika futhi wafulathela (emfundisweni)
Wayesehamba eya kubantu bakhe (eziqhenya)
Usizi kuwena usizi
Bese (kuba) usizi kuwena, usizi
Ngakube umuntu ucabanga ukuthi uzoyekwa evinjiwe
Wayengesilona yini iconsi lesidoda
Wayeseba yihlule legazi ngakho-ke (uMvelinqangi) wadala (ubuyena) walinganisa (ubuyena)
Wayesenza ngaye okubili isilisa nesifazane
Akuyena yini okwazi (unamandla) okuvusa abafile
Ngempela ngakube safika yini kumuntu isikhathi lapho ayengeyilutho engacatshangwa
Ngempela thina samdala umuntu ngesidoda esihlangene (sowesilisa nowesifazane) samlinga sabe sesimenzela ukuzwa nokubona
Ngempela thina samholela endleleni ukuze abe ngobongayo noma ongabongi
Ngempela sabalungiselela abangakholwa amaketango namakhamandela nomlilo
Ngempela abalungile bayophuzela enkomishini (yewayini) elihlanganiswe namakha
Umthombo okuyophuza khona izinceku zikaMvelinqangi, ziyowenza ukuthi uphophoze ukuphophoza okuhle
Bafeza izifungo futhi besaba usuku ububi balo oluyokwanda (yonke indawo)
Futhi banikeza kanti bayakuthanda loko kudla, ngendlela athanda ngayo osweleyo nentandane kanye nesiqgila
Futhi bethi sinondlela ubuso bukaMvelinqangi – asiwufuni kunina umvuzo noma ukubongwa
Ngempela siyesaba eNkosini yethu usuku olulukhuni olunzima
Manjalo uyobasindisa uMvelinqangi ebubini balolosuku, futhi uyokwenza ukuthi bahlangane nobucwazicwazi kanye nenjabulo
Futhi uyobanika umvuzo ngokubekezela kwabo ngesivande kanye nosilika
Bephumulile lapho kusona (isivande) emibhedeni yokucambalala emini, phakathi abaliboni ilanga noma ukubanda okukhulu
Futhi eduzane ngaphezulu kwabo imithunzi yaso (isivande) futhi izithelo zaso ziyolengiselwa eduze kakhulu (ukuze bazithole kalula)
Futhi kuyojikeleziswa kubona izitsha zesiliva kanye nezinkomishi zengilazi
Izingilazi (ezenziwe) ngesiliva, ukwenziwa kwazo okulinganisiwe
Futhi bayophuziswa lapho phakathi enkomishini (yewayini) inhlanganisela yayo yijinja
Umthombo lapho phakathi (esivandeni) obizwa ngokuthi isalsabil
